entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WasmAppHost does not serve correct CORS headers for dotnet.native.worker.mjs #108460
  • [API Proposal]: Allow collections expression for other collections #108457
    10.0.0
  • Unactionable trim warnings on property/event with attribute that has RUC ctor #108454
    10.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement GetPEFileBase #108450
    10.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection fails to find the new version of the LDAP library on Alpine linux 3.20 #108448
  • Memory is not released when using TransactionScope with async option #108447
  • SerializationBinder.BindToName not called for an Array Type #108444
  • [API Proposal]: GeneratedCodeAttribute should have additional constructors #108443
  • Debugging from Visual Studio using Host.CreateDefaultBuilder sets the ContentRootPath to GetCurrentDirectory() which is not the output directory by default #108435
  • XmlSerializer does not respect member type specified in XmlElement attribute when DynamicCodeSupport is false #108432
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Branchless clamp #108431
    Future
  • Custom attributes are lost when configuring TraceListeners via an XML configuration file #108428
  • [Perf] Multiple platforms: Regressions in System.Reflection #108445
    10.0.0
  • Bug in IndexOf with InvariantCultureIgnoreCase in .NET 5 and above? #108424
  • Investigate use of new Apple JIT APIs #108423
    10.0.0
  • TCP Socket - Connection reset while receiving data #108421
    Future

Closed

  • Update our runtime-deps packages to provide guidance for users on Ubuntu 24.04 #105046
  • Ubuntu 24.04 LTS is not supported by the .NET 9 Preview installer. Please use the dotnet-install script - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-install-script. #106452
  • Reverting OS snapshot results in improper cleaning of dot net #107242
  • Unable to Install dotnetcore2 on macOS ARM64 (M1, M2, M3) Using Poetry #108316
  • Unmanaged memory growth with DiagnosticsClient #105132
    10.0.0
  • `NetworkCredential` method parameters nullability do not match `ICredentials` and `ICredentialsByHost` #108134
  • System.Uri throws an exception for absolute URI without two slashes after protocol (http:hostname) #107922
  • Add tests for structs with InlineArray attribute #107857
    10.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in SessionIDManager.RemoveSessionID #108426
  • Endless HttpMessageHandler cleanup cycle with C# cmdlets using .NET generic host #36172
    Future
  • Host error_codes.h should include basic description as comments #95615
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration
  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #108463
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #108462
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix buffer dropped reason in ConfigurableArrayPool #108461
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: move funclet separation later #108456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add instructions to debug CLI builds using VS #108455
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Couple minor docs updates #108453
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108451
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Prototype architecture independent code paths in the BCL #108449
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Investigate `SpawnBrowserAsync` issue by adding debugging. #108440
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [infra][android Disable Android ARM64 runtime tests job #108439
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108434
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Enable build with Checked option for libraries configuration #108433
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update System.Formats.Nrbf ref sources and restore package description #108430
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [ppc64le] Fixed assertion failure which was occurring while running System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters tests #108429
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][interp] Fix stack state after unconditional branch #108425
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use VNVisitReachingVNs in more places #108420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108419
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't bail out on side-effects in assertionprop #108418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108452
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Fix devirtualization across genericness in the hierarchy #108442
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Couple minor docs updates #108407
    area-Meta
  • remove dead code from BCL.cs #108165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fold some casts early in importer #108356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix partial compilation for CETCOMPAT mode #108062
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108283
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Dispose Xunit ToolCommand - follow up #108387
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bump `Playwright` on `WasmBuildTests` to `1.47.0` #108441
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove `AppDomain` from `DebugInterface::Load/UnloadClass` #107808
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Swift interop] Add inline array struct lowering tests #107859
    area-Interop-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Disable `RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations` failing with a timeout #108427
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • Add comments to host error_codes.h #107775
    area-Host

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2550577 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    blocking, blocking-clean-ci, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108415
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow devirt into abstract classes if we saw a non-abstract child #108379
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Share pthread_setname via minipal #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove OverflowException for ReadCborNegativeIntegerRepresentation #108398
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Add build-time check for unwind proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Add sampling profiler #108083
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0][PERF] Backport python pipeline changes for performance tests #108412
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • guard agains empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Pass content length into limited streams as Int64 #105481
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • feat: makes GeneratedCodeAttribute constructor parameters optional #108393
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement NibbleMap lookup and tests #108403
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix SIMD class retrieval and type checks #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [wasm] Debug missing MicrosoftNetCoreAppRuntimePackDir #107280
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException when buffers total size greater than 2GB #108380
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [WIP][NO-MERGE][infra] Try osx.1200.amd64.iphone.open queue #107923
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Expand an optimization for short values to IgnoreCase in single-value SearchValues<string> #108368
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, community-contribution, area-Threading-mono
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix flag assignment in pal_termios #108409
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
